title: Himi 585
lyrics:
M.L. loua
1.
‘Oiau ‘a e hokotaki ē
‘A e ‘Ofa’anga he tangata!
Tangi mamahi ‘a fefine,
‘Ai tauanga’a pē ‘a e ‘atā.
Ha’u ange, kau he ‘oiauē,
Ha’a ‘ofa ki hotau ‘Otua;
He ‘oku ma’amoutolu pē
Toto na ‘oku tulutā.
2.
‘Oiau ‘a e ‘ofa ta’emalau!
Pekia ma’au ‘a ‘Ātonai!
Mamahi ‘oku hulu atu
He tō ‘a e houhau ‘a e Tamai.
Fetautaulaki kia Ia
‘A e hia kotoa pē ‘a e tangata;
Mapelu kuo mafasia,
Foa hono mafu pea hala.
3.
‘Oiau he hifo he ‘Akau,
‘Ave, ‘o tuku he fonua!
Sila’i ke ma’u ‘a e maka kafu,
Tuʻu ‘a e kau le’o ē ‘i tu’a,
Fai, kau fefine, ho’mou tangi;
Ko hotau mafi kuo t ō.
Ko e Fakalave ‘o māmani
Ikuna ‘e he Tēvolo.
4.
ʻĒ, tuku mu’a ‘a e fākafoa,
Ko Sīsū kuo foki mai.
‘Ikai mapuke ‘e Fa’itoka
Hae hono songo ‘e he Mafi.
ʻĒ, hiki tuē, ‘o mavava,
He Hau tupu’a ni kuo liliu:
Si’i Fanautama ‘a Tangata
Kuo Tu’i ‘eni Aoniu. *
